servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: P2762: Torque Converter Clutch Pressure Control Solenoid Control Circuit Range / Performance

entry.ptxt: Difference between target current of TCC solenoid valve circuit and monitor current of TCC solenoid valve circuit is more than specified value.

item.ptxt: TCC pressure control solenoid valve or its circuit

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P2763: Torque Converter Clutch Pressure Control Solenoid Control Circuit High:4 A/T .

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch OFF.
Clear DTCs in TCM and ECM memories by using scan tool.
Start engine and warm it up to normal operating temperature.
Keep engine running at idle speed for 30 seconds or more.
Check DTC, pending DTC and freeze-frame data.

action.ptxt: Go to A/T System Check:4 A/T .

testgroup.title: Check for TCC pressure control solenoid valve circuit

test1.ptxt: Check TCM and TCM connector(s) for proper connection at related terminals.
If OK, check resistance for TCC pressure control solenoid valve circuit.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

testgroup.title: Check TCC pressure control solenoid valve resistance

test1.ptxt: Check solenoid connector for proper connection at related terminals.

Check resistance of TCC pressure control solenoid valve circuit referring to Solenoid Valves (Shift Solenoid-A, Shift Solenoid-B, TCC Pressure Control Solenoid and Pressure Control Solenoid) Inspection:4 A/T .

testgroup.question: Is check results satisfactory?

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble or faulty TCM. Check for intermittent trouble referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection . If OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Replace TCC pressure control solenoid valve or solenoid connector.
